title: [PerfStar] Add tests for BuildCheck
body: Set up the continuous monitoring of main with and without build check analysis opted in.

nodes.body:
I made the draft PR https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/dotnet-perfstar/pullrequest/554946. 
@maridematte can you work on fixing it, testing it and merging the PR?
Things to fix in the PR:
- the repo is not included to the tests
- PR uses /analyze instead of /check 
- maybe add some console app tests as well
